jobDescription: Are you bored of the hum drum, do you long for a role that reminds you why you became a psychologist? Do you want to be part of one of the fastest growing psychology firms and work with some of the biggest companies in the world?The Solutions Team are the Mind of Mind Gym. We are responsible for creating, defining, and improving all of Mind Gyms solutions and products, we do this with two main principles:Firstly, everything we do is based in science, so if we cant back up with research what were doing, we wont be doing it.Secondly, our approach always focuses on Engage, Participate, and Activate, as learning starts before you get to the classroom and doesnt just end when the bell rings.What you'll be doing Design new solutions and customize our existing products to meet client needCreate world-beating learning and internal communication experiences that are proven to change businesses as well as the people who work in themIncorporate current psychology and learning theory developments in all your workEvaluate the impact of solutions and continuously improve them About you A psychologist, preferably (though not essentially) with some experience of working with a team in a related environment such as researching, designing training, and human capital management interventionsA business savvy scientist, who is comfortable, and has experience being the client-facing technical expertSomeone whos comfortable in a client-facing role, and can pass on their passion and curiosity to clientsAn articulate and influential relationship builder who understands the corporate environment, ideally from a performance management or L&D;An ambitious individual who; Loves the idea of helping people use their minds more effectively Is curious about psychology, business and the world in general Is passionate about developing people, in particular the clients they serve
